title: Machine Care Calendar
description: A comprehensive maintenance schedule for every Arco machine. Daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, and annual tasks — follow this calendar to keep your machine performing like new for years.
hero_image_alt: A clean, well-maintained Arco espresso machine with cleaning supplies arranged beside it — brush, cloth, descaling solution, and backflush disc

daily.task: Empty and rinse the drip tray
Wipe the steam tip with a damp cloth immediately after each use
Run a water-only cycle to flush the brew path after the last drink of the day

weekly.task: Remove and soak the portafilter and basket in hot water for 15 minutes
Wipe the exterior and drip tray slot with a damp microfibre cloth
Clean the water reservoir with fresh water — do not use soap

monthly.task: Descale using Arco Descaling Solution (if no water filter installed and water is medium-hard or above)
Inspect the silicone gasket in the portafilter holder for cracks or coffee buildup

quarterly.task: Replace the water filter cartridge (if installed)
Deep-clean the steam wand by soaking in a milk-cleaning solution for 20 minutes

annual.task: Replace the portafilter gasket (group head seal)
Inspect the power cord and plug for damage

daily.task: Purge the group head with a short burst of water before the first shot
Wipe the steam wand immediately after frothing
Empty the drip tray and knock box
Rinse the portafilter and basket under hot running water

weekly.task: Backflush with water only (insert blind basket, run 3 cycles of 10 seconds)
Soak baskets and portafilter in Arco Cleaning Powder solution for 15 minutes
Clean the shower screen with a group head brush
Wash the water reservoir with warm water

monthly.task: Backflush with Arco Cleaning Powder (1g in blind basket, 5 on/off cycles)
Inspect and clean the shower screen — remove with a flat screwdriver if needed

quarterly.task: Descale with Arco Descaling Solution following the machine's descaling mode
Replace the water filter cartridge
Lubricate the cam lever mechanism with food-safe silicone grease

annual.task: Replace the group head gasket
Replace the shower screen and dispersion plate
Have a technician inspect the pump pressure and boiler condition

daily.task: Empty the grounds container when prompted
Empty and rinse the drip tray
Run the automatic rinse cycle (the machine does this on startup and shutdown)
Rinse the milk carafe or frother attachment after each milk drink

weekly.task: Remove and rinse the brew unit under warm running water — no soap
Clean the milk system with the automatic milk-clean cycle
Wipe the bean hopper and chute with a dry cloth
Wash the water reservoir with warm water

monthly.task: Run a cleaning tablet through the brew unit (use the machine's cleaning programme)
Deep-clean the milk system — disassemble and soak all parts
Lubricate the brew unit rails with food-safe grease (apply a thin line to each rail)

quarterly.task: Descale using the machine's automatic descaling programme with Arco Descaling Solution
Replace the water filter cartridge

annual.task: Replace the brew unit seals (o-rings)
Have the grinder burrs inspected — replace if visibly worn or after 10,000 cycles
Full internal inspection by Arco service or authorised technician

daily.task: Purge the group head before the first shot and between shots
Wipe the steam wand immediately after every use — purge briefly to clear milk residue
Rinse the portafilter and basket
Empty the drip tray

weekly.task: Backflush with Arco Cleaning Powder
Soak baskets in cleaning solution
Scrub the group head and shower screen with a nylon brush
Clean the steam wand with a milk-dissolving solution

monthly.task: Remove and clean the shower screen and dispersion plate
Inspect the group gasket for wear (coffee leaking around the portafilter is a sign)

quarterly.task: Descale with Arco Descaling Solution
Replace the water filter cartridge
Check and clean the OPV (over-pressure valve) screen

annual.task: Replace the group head gasket and shower screen
Inspect the solenoid valve for debris
Professional service: pump pressure test, boiler inspection, safety valve check

daily.task: Purge the group head before and between shots
Wipe and purge the steam wand after every use
Rinse portafilter and basket
Empty drip tray and knock box

weekly.task: Backflush with Arco Cleaning Powder
Soak baskets and portafilter springs in cleaning solution
Clean shower screen with group brush
Soak the steam wand tip in milk-cleaning solution

monthly.task: Remove, clean, and inspect the shower screen and dispersion plate
Clean the pressure gauge lens with a soft cloth
Run a full water-only backflush cycle (10 cycles) to clear residue from the solenoid

quarterly.task: Descale with Arco Descaling Solution
Replace the water filter cartridge
Inspect the pre-infusion chamber for scale deposits

annual.task: Replace group gasket, shower screen, and dispersion plate
Replace the solenoid valve o-rings
Professional service: full pressure and temperature calibration

daily.task: Flush the group by lifting and lowering the lever 2-3 times with water only before the first shot
Wipe the steam wand after every use
Rinse the portafilter
Empty the drip tray

weekly.task: Remove and soak the portafilter and basket in cleaning solution
Clean the group head cylinder bore with a damp cloth (lever in up position)
Wipe the chrome lever arm and group body with a soft cloth

monthly.task: Remove the shower screen and piston assembly — clean and inspect the piston seal
Apply food-safe silicone grease to the piston o-ring and cylinder walls

quarterly.task: Descale with Arco Descaling Solution — follow the lever-specific procedure (gravity feed, no pump)
Replace the water filter cartridge
Inspect the lever spring tension — the lever should return to the up position smoothly

annual.task: Replace the piston seal and group gasket
Replace the shower screen
Inspect the boiler pressure stat and safety valve
Professional service: full piston rebuild if extraction pressure feels inconsistent

daily.task: Flush the E61 group head for 5 seconds before the first shot (thermosyphon purge)
Wipe and purge the steam wand
Rinse the portafilter and basket
Empty the drip tray

weekly.task: Backflush with Arco Cleaning Powder using the blind basket
Soak baskets and accessories in cleaning solution
Clean the E61 group head mushroom and screen with a group brush

monthly.task: Remove, disassemble, and clean the E61 group head (mushroom, spring, upper screen)
Lubricate the E61 cam mechanism with food-safe grease
Inspect and clean the thermosyphon tubes (external check for blockage signs)

quarterly.task: Descale with Arco Descaling Solution — E61 machines require running solution through the group AND the steam circuit
Replace the water filter cartridge
Check the expansion valve discharge — a steady drip during brewing is normal, a stream indicates a problem

annual.task: Replace the group gasket and shower screen
Replace the E61 group springs and cam lever seals
Professional service: heat-exchange tube inspection, pump rebuild kit, safety valve test

daily.task: Flush the group head for 3-5 seconds before the first shot
Wipe and purge the steam wand
Rinse portafilter and basket
Empty the drip tray

weekly.task: Backflush with Arco Cleaning Powder
Soak baskets in cleaning solution
Scrub the group head and shower screen
Clean the steam wand with milk-dissolving solution

monthly.task: Remove and deep-clean the shower screen and dispersion block
Flush the steam boiler by opening the hot water tap for 30 seconds (removes stale water and mineral deposits)
Clean the PID temperature probes (external wipe, check display accuracy)

quarterly.task: Descale both boilers independently using the machine's descale mode and Arco Descaling Solution
Replace the water filter cartridge (or in-line filter if direct-plumbed)
Inspect the plumbing connections for leaks (if direct-plumbed)

annual.task: Replace the group gasket, shower screen, and dispersion block
Replace the anti-vacuum valve on the steam boiler
Professional service: full boiler inspection, element check, pump rebuild, pressure profiling calibration
